title: Is 4200 in PESSAT enough for a seat in Electronic City ECE?
content: Hey guys, I am a first year student doing [B.tech](https://B.tech) Biotechnology. A friend of mine wants to take ECE in EC campus with a PESSAT rank of 4200. Is it possible?

comments.body: if you had attended the 2nd rnd counseling today, you would have got ECE in EC
